name: Greenopedia
overview:
Greenopedia is one-stop resource that helps to educate and support the rapidly growing population of those seeking to live more sustainably.

Educate: Our green encyclopedia of information breaks down the complicated topics of sustainability and presents them in a simple way that is more easily understood by a broader audience. Like an encyclopedia, it is thorough, authoritative & evergreen (long-lasting). It is not a blog, news site, or wiki.

Support: Using the same complex-becomes-simple format, our Green Company Directory helps consumers at various levels of green, from newcomer to advanced, to quickly and easily find and shop from companies that match their sustainable values.
